name: game-time-accumulator
description: game-time-accumulator class for creating a game

scripts.build: webpack && uglifyjs dist/game-time-accumulator-bundle.js -o dist/game-time-accumulator-bundle.min.js && babel src/game-time-accumulator.js --out-file dist/game-time-accumulator.js && uglifyjs dist/game-time-accumulator.js -o dist/game-time-accumulator.min.js

author: Yuval Saraf
